lines.text: Okay, so... maybe they couldn't use <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone,</c> but...
<c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone</c> sorta sounds like Flesh to Gone, so they did that, in a little circle.
Flesh bein' ''Gone'' sounds like it'd be in the purview of Go Magic, not Stop.
You've countered my logic on exactly the level it was appropriate to counter it.
Yeah, I've learned a thing or two.
